amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-786 to waive compensatory mitigation requirements for maintenance dredging projects in certain inland waterways, inlets, or harbors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Webster (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
